document.masterDocTitle: Aquatic Coleoptera (Dryopidae, Dytiscidae, Elmidae, Gyrinidae, Haliplidae, Helophoridae, Hydrochidae, Hydrophilidae, Noteridae, Psephenidae) of Iowa: Distributional Records and Notes

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Aquatic Coleoptera (Dryopidae, Dytiscidae, Elmidae, Gyrinidae, Haliplidae, Helophoridae, Hydrochidae, Hydrophilidae, Noteridae, Psephenidae) of Iowa: Distributional Records and Notes

subSubSection.paragraph:
Helichus basalis LeConte. Appanoose
:
Unnamed trib. to North Cr., Cincinnati, CTH, 9/15/15; Clarke: South Whitebreast Cr., Weldon, TMM, 8/17/15; Davis: Fox R., Moulton, CTH, 7/17/06; Henry: Little Potomac Cr., Mt. Pleasant, CTH, 8/7/ 15; Jefferson: North Walnut Cr., Pleasant Plain, CTH, 8/14/15; Keokuk: Twin Grove Cr., Ollie, CTH, 6/2/15; Lee: Lick Cr., Shimek State Forest, CTH, 9/10/10; Lucas: Wolf Cr., Chariton, CTH, 8/ 10/05; Monroe: Sage Cr., Stephens Forest, CTH, 8/ 8/14; Poweshiek: Bear Cr., Brooklyn, CTH, 9/25/ 02; Ringgold: Middle Fk. Grand R., Mt. Ayr, KLS, 7/14/04; Taylor: Honey Cr., Bedford, KBK, 8/18/ 04; Van Buren: Coppers Cr., Keosauqua, CTH, 10/ 16/09; Wapello: Des Moines R., Ottumwa, CTH, 10/7/13; Wayne: Wolf Cr., Millerton, CTH, 8/10/ 05. Distribution: Eastern USA , extending west to Iowa in the north and Texas in the south. Iowa forms the northwestern border in the USA with distribution restricted to southern Iowa . This speciesâ€™ habitat preference is under rocky substrate at the edge of streams. In Iowa ,
H. basalis
tends to be collected more frequently in smaller streams. New state record .

Lizard Cr. , Clare , CTH , 9/11/96; Winneshiek: Yellow R ., Postville, CTH , 7/25/07. Distribution : Eastern USA , extending west to Minnesota in the north, Nebraska , and Texas in the south. Habitat preference is woody debris and rocky substrate in small to large streams
.

Drainage Ditch #49, Eagle Grove, JML, 9/3/02. Distribution : Transcontinental in the USA . Habitat preference for
H. striatus
is on debris and under rocky substrate in small to large streams
.
